comment: Cancels class never. First quiz is the most defficult. class average of 33. That quiz will hurt you the rest of the semester so study for that (review section) quiz. Review section is the hardest section.  Study it. has thick accent. MyMathlab is a pain to work with. If offered online tests DECLINE!!!!!! I repeat DONOT take tests online.
her lectures are crystal clear and easy to follow, Her explanation is thorough and understandable.
